tool_description: Get the latest real estate data and statistics by zip code, county, metro, state and the U.S. broken down by property type, price tiers, house size, and number of bedrooms.
name: Realtor.com Scraper
title: Realtor.com Scraper

api_list.name: Search for properties to rent
api_list.description:
Search for listing to rent by Address, School, City, Zip or Neighborhood,
Each requests you will get the count for all listing and you can paginate with the offset, each requests returns 20 results with all the details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realtor-com-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/properties/search_to_rent"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realtor-com-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Auto_complete
api_list.description: Get auto complete suggestions by city, ward, street name to pass in other endpoints. This endpoint also helps to get a specific property id by its address
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realtor-com-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/location_suggestion"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realtor-com-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Property Detail
api_list.description: Get all the details for a listing with property_id. You'll get property_id when searching for properties
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realtor-com-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/properties/details"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realtor-com-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search for Agents
api_list.description:
Search for Agents by Zip, City or Agent name.
Each requests you will get the count for all listing and you can paginate with the offset, each requests returns 20 results with all the details

        }
